quoted_text: “ Worker in HAL were delaying the production so that they can get bonuses in end of the year”  — Air Marshal Diptendu Chowdhury, PVSM, AVSM, VM, VSM .JUST UNBELIEVABLE !! how babus in HAL were sabotaging national security at expense of bonuses!!! , who need external enemies if we have these rotten creatures in our system.
